issue.title: Problem compiling against gazebo using pkg-config and a local sdformat install

content.raw:
I am using gyp in gzweb for bindng C++ with javascript which doesn't allow CMake's `find_package` command so I'll have to stay with `pkg-config`.

here's the [binding.gyp](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gzweb/src/aaa1aee90b966d63cb41a4d000498a27306f7fc1/gzbridge/binding.gyp) file in gzweb that uses pkg-config for finding gazebo
